    Authorized Dealer

    Marine Ceramic Coating

    Advanced marine-grade ceramic protection that delivers superior hydrophobic performance and long-lasting defense against the elements.

    Why Marine Ceramic Coating?

    The ultimate surface protection for vessels exposed to South Florida's demanding marine conditions.

    Hydrophobic Surface

    Water beads and sheets off instantly, reducing water spots and mineral deposits from saltwater and rain.

    Anti-Fouling Properties

    The slick ceramic surface makes it harder for algae, barnacles, and marine growth to adhere to your hull.

    UV & Oxidation Shield

    Prevents the sun from fading, yellowing, and oxidizing gel coat and painted surfaces over time.

    Chemical Resistance

    Stands up to fuel spills, bird droppings, fish blood, and harsh cleaning agents without etching.

    Enhanced Gloss & Depth

    Amplifies the shine and color depth of your vessel's finish for a showroom-quality appearance on the water.

    Easier Cleaning

    Contaminants release with a simple rinse-down, dramatically reducing scrubbing time and frequency.

    Multi-Surface Application

    Protects gel coat, paint, metal hardware, glass, and even non-skid surfaces throughout the vessel.

    Long-Lasting Results

    Professional-grade marine ceramic coatings provide years of protection with proper maintenance.

    XPEL Fusion Plus™ Marine Ceramic Coating

    We apply XPEL Fusion Plus™ ceramic coating — a professional-grade nano-ceramic formulation with high concentrations of SiO₂ and TiO₂. This marine-specific coating creates a permanent bond with the surface, delivering extreme hydrophobic performance, chemical resistance, and UV protection engineered for the harshest saltwater environments.

    Professional GradeHigh SiO₂/TiO₂ concentration
    Extreme Hydrophobic120°+ water contact angle
    Multi-Year ProtectionPermanent surface bond

    Our Ceramic Coating Process

    1

    Surface Inspection

    Thorough assessment of all surfaces to identify oxidation, staining, or imperfections that need correction.

    2

    Decontamination & Prep

    Deep cleaning, clay bar treatment, and chemical decontamination to create a perfectly clean bonding surface.

    3

    Paint Correction

    Machine polishing to remove swirls, scratches, and oxidation — restoring surfaces to their best possible condition.

    4

    Ceramic Application

    Multiple layers of marine-grade ceramic coating applied by hand, ensuring full and even coverage on all protected surfaces.

    5

    Curing & Inspection

    Controlled curing period followed by a detailed final inspection to ensure flawless coating adhesion and finish.

    Elevate Your Vessel's Protection

    Experience the difference professional marine ceramic coating makes.

    WHY BESPOKE

    Why Choose Bespoke for Marine Ceramic Coating

    Saltwater-Resistant Coating

    XPEL Fusion Plus™ creates a hydrophobic barrier that repels salt, minerals, and marine contaminants — dramatically reducing corrosion and staining on gel coat.

    Marine Application Experts

    Coating a boat isn't like coating a car. We understand marine surfaces — gel coat, fiberglass, painted hulls — and the prep required for lasting adhesion.

    5-Year Marine Warranty

    Professional-grade ceramic coating backed by a 5-year warranty. Annual maintenance inspections keep your vessel's coating performing at its peak.

    UV & Oxidation Shield

    Miami's relentless sun oxidizes marine surfaces fast. Ceramic coating blocks UV degradation, keeping gel coat and paint vibrant season after season.
